name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What kind of life do you want to live?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A countdown to remind you how much time left of your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will replace your new table by a real-time countdown to remind you how many days left of your life based on SSA's actuarial life tables.

This extension is inspired by another extension called Death Focus, developed by kevin. I added a text above the countdown, which comes from the title of Hayao Miyazaki's movie, and support dark/light mode switch.
